Text: Eddie have your read Joseph Wambaugh. He wrote about policemen in LA. No torrents of his books, but there are nzb. I only have the New Centurions. If you have time, could you...???
Thanks Eddie!  Have you seen City of Whispering Stone?  Also, Lord of Ice and Loneliness was only published in French, but I'm hoping I could get an ebook and translate it...... Thanks!
